About the Event

Our Winter Data Science School focuses on Generative AI, aiming to provide participants with deep insights into generative techniques, practical skills, and networking opportunities. The event features keynotes, panel discussions, research presentations, a hackathon, and more.

Stay connected and updated by following us on LinkedIn.

Key Features of the Event

Keynote Presentations

Learn from world-class experts in Generative AI

Poster Sessions

Explore the latest AI research through interactive poster sessions

Panel Discussions

Engage with experts in dynamic panel discussions on cutting-edge AI topics

Our Partners
